title: Watch Face Scoon Textura
summary: A complex animated watch face with 3D textures / weather/ power dials and more
description: For Android Wear Original design exclusive watch faceMillions of combinationsThis watch face is unique and no copy. The Scoon Textura is one of the most complicated watch face available at this moment. It took hundreds of hours to make these complex animations to work. The gear covers can be hidden or set to  rotate when tilting wrist  by using your watches accelerometer. The Image of the watch winder will realistically simulate gravitational effects right on your wrist. You can change settings live and on the watch. No need to do this in your mobile phone.This watch is made for Android Wear watches like the Motorola 360 and the LG G Watch Round. It includes a square dial so it can be used on square watches like the LG ZenWatch.Please rate us positive if you like our work! We see that some users don't know to find a setting. We can help you with that or finding other functions.Why the Textura is the most fantastic smart watch face:★Millions of combinations can be created to suit any mood.★ It has complex transparent animations★ Accelerometer effects are implemented★ Weather information is available★ You can set options live on the watch by swiping and ticking★ All gears turn in a complex way to give you that realistic look★ You can set the Tourbillon or disable it.★ It has the ultimate millionair factor★ You can make numerous combinations. You are getting a lot of watches in this app.★ You can choose for skeleton look or set beautiful dials★ premium metals have been used to create the best apearance★ Many hours are invested in this design. It is the most complex watch face app today available.★ You can set date and power indicators and their location★ You can choose analog or digital indicators★ You can choose modern style or classic hands★ Also features a square design★ Future improvements and updates will follow... How to change/ build your ultimate watch:- buy and download our app and wait till the watch face shows up in your watch- select the Texture by long clicking your watch face and then ticking the gear symbol below. Or set it in the Android Wear app on your phone- when activated on your watch go to the settings of Textura in the Android Wear app of your phone- select your flavors of choice and change rotations speeds if preferred in the Android Wear app on your phone- if our watch face doesn't show up in your watch please try to restart your watch. It can take some time to load this complex watch- change your preferences by long clicking the watch face. Then swipe up. Swipe and tick to select.- pull your sleeve up so everybody asks what awesome watch you have on your wristSupport us and follow us on http://www.facebook.com/scoonwearhttp://plus.google.com/+scoondesignhttp://www.scoonwear.comMore complicated watch faces will follow from Marc Notenboom and Wes Scoggin @ Scoon Wear
descriptionHTML:
For Android Wear
Original design exclusive watch face
Millions of combinations

This watch face is unique and no copy.
The Scoon Textura is one of the most complicated watch face available at this moment. It took hundreds of hours to make these complex animations to work. The gear covers can be hidden or set to rotate when tilting wrist by using your watches accelerometer. The Image of the watch winder will realistically simulate gravitational effects right on your wrist. You can change settings live and on the watch. No need to do this in your mobile phone.

This watch is made for Android Wear watches like the Motorola 360 and the LG G Watch Round. It includes a square dial so it can be used on square watches like the LG ZenWatch.

Please rate us positive if you like our work! We see that some users don't know to find a setting. We can help you with that or finding other functions.

Why the Textura is the most fantastic smart watch face:
★Millions of combinations can be created to suit any mood.
★ It has complex transparent animations
★ Accelerometer effects are implemented
★ Weather information is available
★ You can set options live on the watch by swiping and ticking
★ All gears turn in a complex way to give you that realistic look
★ You can set the Tourbillon or disable it.
★ It has the ultimate millionair factor
★ You can make numerous combinations. You are getting a lot of watches in this app.
★ You can choose for skeleton look or set beautiful dials
★ premium metals have been used to create the best apearance
★ Many hours are invested in this design. It is the most complex watch face app today available.
★ You can set date and power indicators and their location
★ You can choose analog or digital indicators
★ You can choose modern style or classic hands
★ Also features a square design
★ Future improvements and updates will follow...

How to change/ build your ultimate watch:
- buy and download our app and wait till the watch face shows up in your watch
- select the Texture by long clicking your watch face and then ticking the gear symbol below. Or set it in the Android Wear app on your phone
- when activated on your watch go to the settings of Textura in the Android Wear app of your phone
- select your flavors of choice and change rotations speeds if preferred in the Android Wear app on your phone
- if our watch face doesn't show up in your watch please try to restart your watch. It can take some time to load this complex watch
- change your preferences by long clicking the watch face. Then swipe up. Swipe and tick to select.
- pull your sleeve up so everybody asks what awesome watch you have on your wrist

Support us and follow us on
http://www.facebook.com/scoonwear
http://plus.google.com/+scoondesign
http://www.scoonwear.com

More complicated watch faces will follow from Marc Notenboom and Wes Scoggin @ Scoon Wear
comments: Really like the design but issues on Huawei A nice selection of relatively interesting, but limited, customisations but on my Huawei watch it consumes huge amounts of battery vs the standard options (8 hours vs several days of the same use). The watch is also slow to come out of sleep with this enabled and transitions through a black and white minimal face first. As a result I'm no longer using it.
Huawei Settings dont ever take effect and the movement isnt smooth. Worst menu. Google play wont refund. No phone app.
Beautiful I love this watch face. It's gorgeous!
Took me a while to work it out but finally got it and love it
dont know how to change the different watch faces
Never got the watch face I purchased the watch face and it did not show up on my phone or on the Android Wear.
recentChanges: -Updated for higher res screens such as the Huawei Watch.
Updated weather URL for more reliable weather responses.
-added color picker for digital time which includes opacity
